metadata.name: TPWCTFIAE
metadata.description:
NFT video from my track ***The Past Was Clear, The Furure Is An Explosion***.

Owner can access to the full video file with this [token gated link] (https://bit.ly/TPWCTFIAE) - https://bit.ly/TPWCTFIAE

Video is a processed image with effects reacting to the music frequencies.

NFT music minted on [Catalog Records] (https://beta.catalog.works/memory-scale/the-past-was-clear-the-future-is-an-explosion)

(should be cool if you own both!)

You can to get in touch with me via Instagram or Twitter - @memoryscalemusic
